Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Westbound Reroute near Cermak/Pulaski
ShortDescription: Westbound 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak. Ogden, Kostner and Cermak, due to street blockage near Cermak/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak. Ogden, Kostner and Cermak, due to street blockage near Cermak/Pulaski.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
